item.title: Help Wanted - Apply Within
item.description: Ok, so we're looking for... Voices - to promote this group to whoever and however you can, but twitter might be a simple starting point, please retweet stuff. Hands - to help run the group, from posting stuff to twitter or tumblr, to organising meetups. Sponsors - we don't need a huge amount of cash, just enough to pay for the hire of the function room at a pub in Leeds, maybe a bit extra for a bite to eat and Beer.
